_header: With bodily food Increasing in quantity
_description: An admonition against excess — a single stanza rhyme royal

Lam259.First Lines:
Wyth bodylye ffode Encressyng in quantiteeOuer mesure passyng
                    sufficiaunces…
Lam259.Last Lines:
Þouȝe I þe trewthe vttere ȝe hiere nott att
                    allþrouȝe me did non [B??wer] cas is þis fall —
                    london
Lam259.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “A Warning Against Lechery.” 
             Philological Quarterly
         35 (1956): 90-5: 92.
